name: Zombie Evolution Party
description:
***** "I actually find it very addicting!! "
***** "This game is a really really good game. I play all the time."
***** "This game is awesome and so are the others."

One little, two little, three little zombies.
Four little, five little, six little zombies...

Experience the greatest zombie raising game on the earth! No deads, only undeads. No buddies, only zombies.

- To improve your taste, zombie raising is your no-brainer choice

- Change your attitude towards zombies!

- Free, absolutely free, really absolutely free...

- Broaden your social network

- Thought-provoking, improve your degree of patience!

- Let's stop blah blah, experience it yourself now
